General.Name: Anhui Huamao Textile Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Huamao Textile Co., Ltd. produces and sells textile products in China. Its products include cotton and polyester yarns, fabrics, and threads, as well as clothing products. The company offers its products under the Chengfeng and Yinbo brands. Anhui Huamao Textile Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Anqing, China.
General.Address: No.80, South Fangzhi Road, Anqing, China, 246018

1.Name: Mr. Zhang Hong  Wang
1.Title: CFO, Head of Accounting Department & Director
